item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
116 Crown
New Haven, CT 06511

Owner/Manager-John

Come join the NHC at New Haven's hip and trendy bar/restaurant 116 Crown. They are normally closed on Mondays, however; with a promise of a minimum of 40 attendees, they will open just for us. Yay for NHC!!!


***Specialty Cocktails:
Church Key - 9 (reg. price $12)
Thom Collins - 6 (reg. price $8)
Cachaca Mojito - 6 (reg. price $8)

Food: (sampling of)
Vegetable Tempura
Bresaola & Tomato Jam Finger Sandwiches
Cheese, Bread & Olive Platter
Chocolate Chip & Espresso Cookies


Contact is Robyn-Allise: 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour-116 Crown- Opening just for NHC Members & Friends!!!
